body_html:
@claynerobison @nhasabni I have verified MKL build on linux with latest #17396 and it passed without errors:

Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package
INFO: Elapsed time: 1693.973s, Critical Path: 60.63s
INFO: Build completed successfully, 4388 total actions

Build command

bazel build --config=mkl --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Also tried with the one from your log

bazel build --config=mkl --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-march=broadwell --copt=-O3 --copt=-L/opt/tensorflow/gcc6.3/lib64 -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

The rename issues was fixed 4 days ago in 65e8bd0

body:
@claynerobison @nhasabni I have verified MKL build on linux with latest #17396 and it passed without errors:
```
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package
INFO: Elapsed time: 1693.973s, Critical Path: 60.63s
INFO: Build completed successfully, 4388 total actions
```
Build command
```
bazel build --config=mkl --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
Also tried with the one from your log
```
bazel build --config=mkl --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-march=broadwell --copt=-O3 --copt=-L/opt/tensorflow/gcc6.3/lib64 -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
The rename issues was fixed 4 days ago in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/17396/commits/65e8bd064836156cc699507eb1797d3027435cdb
